name: Dead Forest
description:
In search of a single answer to one question that has long tormented him, Laki approaches mysterious dark wood called Dead Forest. But he would not manage to travel alone - the cursed animal encounters Claude, a spider who is odd just like himself. What would Laki discover about his companion and about himself? What do ancient ruins hide? Would he be able to find the right path among the tangled trails of the Dead Forest, where such path is easy to miss?

The game offers:
- To reveal the secret of the forest, find out its past and the reason why all animals have dissapeared;
- To read the story that may change dramatically at any time;
- Four characters with whom you may build a romantic relationship;
- Unique soundtrack, included.
